page.title: 11Living in West Tytherley
page.content: Most old people think that living in the village is interesting,but they feel the village needs more entertainment. It is a very friendly place and it has a {Coach Service, {Public House,Petrol Station }and a { {shop.}There is a recreation ground for the children ,and two schools very near by.Some people go to the chapel,but the majority go to {Church. Nearly all of the people in the village use the local shop and post office,but they go regulary to {Romsey or {Salisbury,}mostly to the {Markets. However the younger generation had much different views,for them the village is boring with nothing to do except mess about and they get told off for that.They all thought that public toilets were needed down at the recreation ground. _
